email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this email finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for the shipment of 25,000MT of coal from Newcastle to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the MV OCEAN HORIZON, with a DWT of 82,000 and LOA of 225m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. Our initial freight quote is USD 22.50 per metric ton.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Given the volume we are shipping, could you consider lowering the freight to USD 21.00 per metric ton?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your response. Considering the volume and our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 21.50 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is set at USD 15,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th October, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 21.50 per metric ton, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Newcastle on 1st October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Michael Jones
Charterers Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Coal Shipment - Newcastle to Shanghai - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
Maritime Brokers
